START_TOUR_TEXT: Welcome to the tutorial of Eurostat's energy balance visualisation tool. This guided tour will show you the main ways of interacting with the tool. For a more detailed documentation click here.
TUTO_2: The tool contains a menu for additional features. Click on the menu icon to customize the chart. Click next to learn about the menu options.
TUTO_4: Use this menu to access the tutorial or metadata or send some feedback
TUTO_6: Click here to download a picture or data.
TUTO_8: use this button to embebed the chart in other tools
TUTO_10: Use this option to expand the flows of the energy balance table
TUTO_12: Use this option to visualise the data of the energy balance table using pie charts, bar charts or line charts
TUTO_22: Sharing it with others on Twitter, Facebook, e-mail and LinkedIn will help us improve our tool. Thank you!
END_TOUR_TITLE: That is it for our tour.
END_TOUR_TEXT:
All the images illustrating the definitions in this tool are coming from Unsplash or pixabay.
If you find this visualisation tool useful, please share it with others using our social media buttons. Thank you!
